author: Halley Freger, Laura Romero, Allison Pecorin, Matthew Mosk
title: As health officials feared, coronavirus outbreak invading nursing homes
description: The coronavirus outbreak raced through four nursing homes over the weekend, infecting hundreds of residents at senior living facilities and killing at least five people. At a press conference Monday, Maryland Gov. Larry Hogan called the outbreak in one senior…
content:
